channel.title: 2 Questions Help please..!
channel.description: 1) how to make only donators open the shop? 2) how do i make the Teleport Spell tele to where ever i want?

item.title: 2 Questions Help please..!
item.dc:creator: @Lorenzo_Vq Lorenzo Vq
item.description:
@Lorenzo_Vq wrote:

Well, for the teleporting thing, i have an answer.
first off, go into a notepad called “clickingmost.java”, and find the action button (teleporting button) that you want to change it to teleport you to.

Example: (heres a code for catherby for straight teleporting)

case 4150: // catherby teleport c.triggerTele(3028, 3379, 0); c.killMyNPCs(); c.resetfollowers(); break;

and if you want something that will open an option list for teleporting use this

Example: (another code)

case 50245: // edgeville teleport c.teleEffect = 1; c.sendQuest("Which wild zone?", 2470); c.sendQuest("Pk Box", 2471); c.sendQuest("Varrock", 2472); c.sendQuest("Mage bank", 2473); c.sendFrame164(2469); break;
Save and compile
Hoped this helped a bit ;D

Read full topic
